short-description:
Hello, I'm
Yojhan Rodriguez.
I'm a web developer.
description: I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. I'm passionate about technology, programming, web development, languages and travels. I'm always willing to face new challenges and learn different things every day.
edu-desc: I majored in Telematics Engineering from Universidad Distrital (Bogota - Colombia).
tools-desc: My skills cover tools such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, among others.
learn-desc: I consider myself to be a self-taught, and I could show in a short period of time great potential to handle different technologies.
langu-desc: I'm interested in other cultures, which have allowed me to be fluent in English.
text-goodbye:
Have any questions? Don't hesitate to contact me.
Just send me an email or contact me through the social sites listed below.
projects-short: Some projects I've worked on or I've helped built
